summary: An email from Paul Byrne to colleagues regarding the use of a Lyft account to provide round-trip transportation for a witness being interviewed for the Maxwell trial, including estimated costs and timing.

persons.name: Paul Byrne
persons.role: Sender of email, likely law enforcement or trial support staff
persons.context: Author of the email arranging Lyft transportation for a witness interview related to the Maxwell trial.

events.title: Witness interview transportation arrangement
events.description: Arrangements made for Lyft rides to transport a witness for an interview related to the Maxwell trial.

keyFacts: A witness was being interviewed for the Maxwell trial as of July 12, 2021.
Lyft rides were arranged for witness transportation, with each ride estimated to cost about $25.
The email indicates logistical planning and support for the legal proceedings in the Maxwell case.
